headline: HII Marks One Year of Newport News Shipbuilding Charleston Operations
summary: GOOSE CREEK, S.C., Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) today marked one year of Newport News Shipbuilding (NNS) Charleston Operations in Goose Creek. The company hosted community and Navy leaders at the facility and a town hall event for all NNS Charleston Operations shipbuilders. “Today, we celebrate our teammates here in South Carolina for the incredible difference you are making and will continue to make,” NNS President Kari Wilkinson said. “Whether you work in South Carolina or

headline: GE Aerospace Q4 Earnings & Revenues Top Estimates, Increase Y/Y
summary: GE tops Q4 estimates as strong engine services demand lifted revenues 18% year over year, with orders surging and 2026 growth outlook raised.
